title: StealthFormBot Output Schema
description: Output schema for the StealthFormBot form submission actor. Results are stored in the default dataset with each submission as a single item. Screenshots are stored in the default key-value store.

submissionResults.title: Form Submission Results
submissionResults.description: Complete form submission results including status, timing, and any extracted confirmation data

screenshotBefore.title: Screenshot Before Submit
screenshotBefore.description: Screenshot taken immediately before form submission

screenshotAfter.title: Screenshot After Submit
screenshotAfter.description: Screenshot taken immediately after form submission

screenshotError.title: Screenshot On Error
screenshotError.description: Screenshot taken when an error occurred during form submission
